quiz.question: cameo __________
quiz.explanation: 浮雕宝石; 小配角, 客串出演. The director made a cameo appearance in the film's opening scene. 导演在电影的开场戏中客串出演。

quiz.question: _____ archipelago
quiz.explanation: 群岛, 希腊群岛. We sailed through the Greek archipelago, visiting dozens of beautiful islands. 我们航行穿过希腊群岛,游览了数十个美丽的岛屿。

quiz.question: ________ virago
quiz.explanation: 泼妇; 悍妇, 大喊大叫的泼妇. The shouting virago frightened all the customers in the restaurant. 那个大喊大叫的泼妇吓坏了餐厅里所有的顾客。

quiz.question: ___ doggo
quiz.explanation: 一动不动地躲藏, 躲藏着不动. The thief decided to lie doggo until the police left the area. 小偷决定躲藏着不动,直到警察离开该地区。

quiz.question: ______ vertigo
quiz.explanation: 眩晕, 动晕症. She experienced motion vertigo during the turbulent flight. 她在颠簸的飞行中感到晕眩。

quiz.question: _____ tango
quiz.explanation: 探戈舞, 跳探戈. They learned to dance tango at the evening class. 他们在晚间课程上学习跳探戈。

quiz.question: cargo ____
quiz.explanation: 货物, 货船. The cargo ship sailed across the Pacific Ocean carrying electronics. 货船载着电子产品横渡太平洋。

quiz.question: ____ poncho
quiz.explanation: 雨披; 斗篷, 雨披. He wore a rain poncho to stay dry during the storm. 他穿着雨披在暴风雨中保持干燥。

quiz.question: _____ braggadocio
quiz.explanation: 吹嘘; 自夸, 空洞的自夸. His claims of success were nothing but empty braggadocio. 他声称的成功不过是空洞的自夸。

quiz.question: _________ imbroglio
quiz.explanation: 复杂的纠纷; 困境, 政治纠葛. The scandal turned into a political imbroglio that lasted for months. 这起丑闻演变成了一场持续数月的政治纠葛。

quiz.question: __________ portfolio
quiz.explanation: 公文包; 投资组合, 投资组合. She carefully diversified her investment portfolio to reduce risk. 她仔细地分散了投资组合以降低风险。

quiz.question: _____-____ scenario
quiz.explanation: 方案; 场景, 最坏情况. The emergency plan covered the worst-case scenario of complete power failure. 应急计划涵盖了完全停电的最坏情况。

quiz.question: _____ impresario
quiz.explanation: 演出经理人; 主办者, 歌剧经理人. The famous opera impresario brought world-class productions to our city. 这位著名的歌剧经理人将世界级的演出带到了我们的城市。

quiz.question: ______ oratorio
quiz.explanation: 清唱剧, 宗教清唱剧. The choir performed a sacred oratorio for the Christmas celebration. 合唱团为圣诞庆典演出了一部宗教清唱剧。

quiz.question: ____ cello
quiz.explanation: 大提琴, 大提琴独奏. The concert featured a beautiful solo cello performance. 音乐会上有一段优美的大提琴独奏表演。

quiz.question: _____ peccadillo
quiz.explanation: 小过失; 轻罪, 小过失. His tardiness was just a minor peccadillo compared to more serious offenses. 与更严重的过失相比,他的迟到只是一个小过失。

quiz.question: ________ dynamo
quiz.explanation: 发电机; 精力充沛的人, 发电机. The bicycle's electric dynamo powered the headlight. 自行车的发电机为前灯供电。

quiz.question: albino ______
quiz.explanation: 白化病患者; 白化的, 白化动物. The zoo acquired a rare albino animal for its collection. 动物园为其收藏获得了一只罕见的白化动物。

quiz.question: _______ inferno
quiz.explanation: 地狱; 火海, 燃烧的火海. The warehouse became a burning inferno within minutes. 仓库在几分钟内变成了燃烧的火海。

quiz.question: boo ______
quiz.explanation: 发嘘声, 大声嘘. The audience began to boo loudly when the performance faltered. 当表演出现失误时,观众开始大声嘘。

quiz.question: _________ bugaboo
quiz.explanation: 恐惧的事物; 困扰, 童年恐惧. Darkness remained a childhood bugaboo that he never quite outgrew. 黑暗仍然是他从未真正克服的童年恐惧。

quiz.question: kangaroo _____
quiz.explanation: 袋鼠, 袋鼠法庭(非正式法庭). The prisoners faced a kangaroo court with no real due process. 囚犯面对的是一个没有真正正当程序的袋鼠法庭。

quiz.question: woo _________
quiz.explanation: 追求; 争取, 争取投资者. The startup worked hard to woo investors with their innovative pitch. 这家初创公司努力用他们创新的提案来争取投资者。

quiz.question: ____ tempo
quiz.explanation: 节奏; 速度, 快节奏. The orchestra played the piece at a fast tempo. 管弦乐队以快节奏演奏这首曲子。

quiz.question: ______ maestro
quiz.explanation: 大师; 音乐大师, 大师级指挥. The master maestro conducted the symphony with extraordinary skill. 大师级指挥以非凡的技艺指挥交响乐团。

quiz.question: _ ____ tyro
quiz.explanation: 新手; 初学者, 仅仅是新手. He was a mere tyro in the field of law. 他在法律领域仅仅是个新手。

quiz.question: _____ virtuoso
quiz.explanation: 艺术大师; 名家, 钢琴大师. The young piano virtuoso amazed audiences with her technical prowess. 这位年轻的钢琴大师以其高超的技艺使观众惊叹不已。

quiz.question: _____ torso
quiz.explanation: 躯干, 人体躯干. The sculpture depicted a human torso in marble. 这座雕塑用大理石描绘了人体躯干。

quiz.question: staccato _____
quiz.explanation: 断奏的; 断续的, 断音. The violinist played the staccato notes with precision. 小提琴家精确地演奏断音。

quiz.question: veto _____
quiz.explanation: 否决权; 否决, 否决权. The president exercised his veto power to block the legislation. 总统行使否决权来阻止该立法。

quiz.question: mosquito ____
quiz.explanation: 蚊子, 蚊子叮咬. The itchy mosquito bite kept her awake all night. 发痒的蚊子叮咬让她整夜无法入睡。

quiz.question: ____ canto
quiz.explanation: 篇章(长诗的), 史诗篇章. The poet recited the epic canto with great passion. 诗人充满激情地朗诵史诗篇章。

quiz.question: ________ memento
quiz.explanation: 纪念品, 纪念品. She kept the locket as a keepsake memento of her grandmother. 她保留着这个小盒作为祖母的纪念品。

quiz.question: _____ concerto
quiz.explanation: 协奏曲, 钢琴协奏曲. The famous piano concerto was composed by Rachmaninoff. 这首著名的钢琴协奏曲由拉赫玛尼诺夫创作。

quiz.question: _____ manifesto
quiz.explanation: 宣言, 政党宣言. The party manifesto outlined their policies for the next term. 政党宣言概述了他们下一任期的政策。

quiz.question: ________ gusto
quiz.explanation: 热情; 兴致, 艺术热情. She painted with artistic gusto, her brushstrokes bold and confident. 她以艺术热情作画,笔触大胆而自信。

quiz.question: _____ libretto
quiz.explanation: 歌剧脚本, 歌剧脚本. The composer collaborated closely with the writer of the opera libretto. 作曲家与歌剧脚本的作者密切合作。

quiz.question: ______ motto
quiz.explanation: 座右铭; 格言, 家族格言. The family motto had been passed down for generations. 这个家族格言已经传承了好几代。

quiz.question: _____ arroyo
quiz.explanation: 干涸的河床; 峡谷, 多岩石的干涸河床. We hiked through the rocky arroyo in the desert. 我们徒步穿越沙漠中多岩石的干涸河床。

quiz.question: reap ________
quiz.explanation: 收获; 获得, 获得好处. Hard work allows you to reap benefits in the long run. 努力工作让你从长远来看获得好处。

quiz.question: lap ____
quiz.explanation: 一圈; 大腿部, 单圈时间. The race car driver achieved the fastest lap time of the day. 赛车手创下了当天最快的单圈时间。

quiz.question: overlap ____
quiz.explanation: 重叠; 交叉, 重叠区域. There is significant overlap area between the two research fields. 这两个研究领域之间有显著的重叠区域。

quiz.question: scrap _____
quiz.explanation: 废料; 碎片, 废金属. The recycling plant processes tons of scrap metal daily. 回收厂每天处理数吨废金属。

quiz.question: sap ________
quiz.explanation: 树液; 削弱, 削弱力量. The prolonged illness began to sap strength from his body. 长期的疾病开始削弱他身体的力量。

quiz.question: wiretap ____
quiz.explanation: 窃听; 窃听装置, 窃听电话. The police obtained a warrant to wiretap call records of the suspect. 警方获得了窃听嫌疑人电话记录的授权。

quiz.question: peep _______
quiz.explanation: 偷看; 窥视, 透过...偷看. Children love to peep through the keyhole at night. 孩子们喜欢在晚上透过钥匙孔偷看。

quiz.question: steep _____
quiz.explanation: 陡峭的; 过高的, 高昂的价格. The luxury car comes with a steep price tag. 这辆豪华汽车的价格标签很高昂。

quiz.question: ______ chip
quiz.explanation: 芯片; 碎片, 薯片. She enjoyed eating a potato chip while watching television. 她喜欢边看电视边吃薯片。

quiz.question: ____ draftsmanship
quiz.explanation: 绘图技巧, 精湛的绘图技巧. The architect's fine draftsmanship was evident in every detail. 建筑师精湛的绘图技巧在每个细节中都显而易见。

quiz.question: _____ championship
quiz.explanation: 锦标赛; 冠军, 世界锦标赛. The athlete trained for years to compete in the world championship. 这位运动员训练多年以参加世界锦标赛。

quiz.question: flip _ ____
quiz.explanation: 翻转; 抛, 抛硬币. Let's flip a coin to decide who goes first. 让我们抛硬币来决定谁先开始。

quiz.question: nip __ ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 掐; 夹, 把...扼杀在萌芽状态. We must nip in the bud any rumors before they spread. 我们必须在谣言传播之前把它扼杀在萌芽状态。

quiz.question: snip ___
quiz.explanation: 剪; 剪断, 剪掉. She used scissors to snip off the loose thread. 她用剪刀剪掉松散的线头。

quiz.question: rip _____
quiz.explanation: 撕裂; 撕开, 撕开. The strong wind threatened to rip apart the tent. 强风威胁要把帐篷撕开。

quiz.question: sip ___
quiz.explanation: 啜饮; 小口喝, 啜饮茶. She sat quietly to sip tea in the garden. 她静静地坐在花园里啜饮茶水。

quiz.question: quip __ ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 俏皮话; 妙语, 每日妙语. His clever quip of the day made everyone laugh. 他每日妙语让所有人都笑了。

quiz.question: ____ whelp
quiz.explanation: 幼兽; 幼崽, 狼崽. The mother protected her wolf whelp from danger. 母狼保护她的狼崽免受危险。

quiz.question: ______ pulp
quiz.explanation: 果肉; 纸浆, 橙子果肉. Fresh juice contains lots of orange pulp and vitamins. 新鲜果汁含有大量橙子果肉和维生素。

quiz.question: decamp __ _____
quiz.explanation: 撤营; 逃走, 夜间撤离. The soldiers decided to decamp at night to avoid detection. 士兵们决定夜间撤离以避免被发现。

quiz.question: damp _____
quiz.explanation: 潮湿的; 使潮湿, 湿布. Clean the surface with a damp cloth. 用湿布清洁表面。

quiz.question: ____ clamp
quiz.explanation: 夹子; 夹紧, 软管夹. Tighten the hose clamp to prevent leaks. 拧紧软管夹以防止泄漏。

quiz.question: ________ stamp
quiz.explanation: 邮票; 印章, 护照印章. The immigration officer placed a passport stamp on the document. 移民官员在文件上盖了护照印章。

quiz.question: swamp ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 沼泽; 使应接不暇, 工作繁重. The new orders will swamp with work the entire department. 新订单将使整个部门工作繁重。

quiz.question: temp ______
quiz.explanation: 临时工; 临时的, 临时工. The company hired a temp worker to cover the vacation period. 公司雇用了一名临时工来顶替休假期间的工作。

quiz.question: ___________ imp
quiz.explanation: 小恶魔; 顽童, 淘气的小恶魔. The mischievous imp played pranks on everyone in the village. 淘气的小恶魔对村里的每个人都恶作剧。

quiz.question: skimp __ _______
quiz.explanation: 节省; 吝啬, 在质量上吝啬. Never skimp on quality when buying safety equipment. 购买安全设备时绝不要在质量上吝啬。

quiz.question: limp _________
quiz.explanation: 跛行; 软弱无力的, 软弱无力的握手. His limp handshake gave a poor first impression. 他软弱无力的握手给人留下了糟糕的第一印象。

quiz.question: primp _______
quiz.explanation: 打扮; 精心装扮, 精心打扮自己. She took an hour to primp oneself before the party. 她花了一个小时精心打扮自己才去参加派对。

quiz.question: _____ bump
quiz.explanation: 碰撞; 肿块, 减速带. Drive slowly over the speed bump to protect your car. 慢速驾驶通过减速带以保护您的汽车。

quiz.question: _ lump ___
quiz.explanation: 肿块; 一次性付款, 一次性总付. He received a lump sum payment when he retired. 他退休时收到了一次性总付款项。

quiz.question: plump ______
quiz.explanation: 丰满的; 使丰满, 丰满的脸颊. The baby had adorable plump cheeks. 婴儿有可爱的丰满脸颊。

quiz.question: ____ fop
quiz.explanation: 花花公子; 纨绔子弟, 虚荣的花花公子. The vain fop spent hours admiring himself in the mirror. 这个虚荣的花花公子花几个小时在镜子前欣赏自己。

quiz.question: _______ coop
quiz.explanation: 笼子; 鸡舍, 鸡舍. The farmer built a new chicken coop for his hens. 农夫为他的母鸡建了一个新鸡舍。

quiz.question: ____ scoop
quiz.explanation: 勺子; 独家新闻, 独家新闻. The journalist got the news scoop of the year. 这位记者获得了年度独家新闻。

quiz.question: __________ hoop
quiz.explanation: 箍; 篮圈, 篮球框. The player shot the ball through the basketball hoop. 球员把球投进篮球框。

quiz.question: _____ loop
quiz.explanation: 环; 循环, 事件循环. The program runs continuously in an event loop. 程序在事件循环中持续运行。

quiz.question: _____ backdrop
quiz.explanation: 背景; 背景幕布, 舞台背景. The theater crew painted a beautiful stage backdrop for the play. 剧院工作人员为这出戏画了一幅美丽的舞台背景。

quiz.question: _______ prop
quiz.explanation: 支柱; 道具, 支撑柱. The miners used a support prop to hold up the tunnel ceiling. 矿工使用支撑柱来支撑隧道顶部。

quiz.question: carp __ _______
quiz.explanation: 鲤鱼; 挑剔, 对细节挑剔. He tends to carp at details instead of seeing the big picture. 他倾向于对细节挑剔,而不是看大局。

quiz.question: _____ scarp
quiz.explanation: 陡坡; 悬崖, 陡峭的悬崖. The climbers carefully ascended the steep scarp. 登山者小心翼翼地攀登陡峭的悬崖。

quiz.question: harp __
quiz.explanation: 竖琴; 喋喋不休, 对...喋喋不休. Stop trying to harp on past mistakes. 不要再对过去的错误喋喋不休了。

quiz.question: _____-____ warp
quiz.explanation: 弯曲; 扭曲, 时空扭曲. Einstein's theory describes the space-time warp caused by massive objects. 爱因斯坦的理论描述了大质量物体造成的时空扭曲。

quiz.question: usurp _____
quiz.explanation: 篡夺; 侵占, 篡夺权力. The general attempted to usurp power from the legitimate government. 将军试图从合法政府篡夺权力。

quiz.question: ________ coup
quiz.explanation: 政变; 妙计, 军事政变. The military coup overthrew the democratically elected president. 军事政变推翻了民选总统。

quiz.question: ______ bazaar
quiz.explanation: 集市; 市场, 街头集市. The colorful street bazaar sold everything from spices to textiles. 五彩缤纷的街头集市出售从香料到纺织品的各种商品。

quiz.question: debar ____ ______
quiz.explanation: 禁止; 排除, 禁止担任公职. The court decided to debar from office the corrupt official. 法院决定禁止这名腐败官员担任公职。

quiz.question: disbar _ ______
quiz.explanation: 取消律师资格, 取消律师资格. The bar association voted to disbar a lawyer for unethical conduct. 律师协会投票决定因不道德行为而取消一名律师的资格。

quiz.question: _______ flatcar
quiz.explanation: 平板车厢, 铁路平板车. The railway flatcar transported heavy machinery across the country. 铁路平板车将重型机械运输到全国各地。

quiz.question: _______ forebear
quiz.explanation: 祖先, 受尊敬的祖先. We pay tribute to our honored forebear who founded this family. 我们向创立这个家族的受尊敬的祖先致敬。

quiz.question: shear ______
quiz.explanation: 剪; 剪切, 剪切应力. Engineers must calculate shear stress when designing bridges. 工程师在设计桥梁时必须计算剪切应力。

quiz.question: linear _____
quiz.explanation: 线性的, 线性模型. The statistician used a linear model to analyze the data. 统计学家使用线性模型来分析数据。

quiz.question: _____ _ spear
quiz.explanation: 矛; 长矛, 投掷长矛. The athlete prepared to throw a spear in the competition. 运动员准备在比赛中投掷长矛。

quiz.question: tear _____
quiz.explanation: 撕裂; 眼泪, 撕开. The conflict threatened to tear apart the community. 这场冲突威胁要撕裂整个社区。

quiz.question: vulgar ____
quiz.explanation: 粗俗的; 庸俗的, 粗俗的笑话. His vulgar joke offended many people at the dinner party. 他粗俗的笑话冒犯了晚宴上的许多人。

quiz.question: ________ hangar
quiz.explanation: 飞机库, 飞机库. The military aircraft hangar housed dozens of fighter jets. 军用飞机库容纳了数十架战斗机。

quiz.question: ________ cougar
quiz.explanation: 美洲狮, 山狮. Hikers should be cautious of the mountain cougar in this region. 徒步旅行者在这个地区应该小心山狮。

quiz.question: char _____
quiz.explanation: 烧焦; 炭, 炭烤架. The chef used a char grill to cook the steaks perfectly. 厨师使用炭烤架将牛排烤得恰到好处。

quiz.question: ______ verisimilar
quiz.explanation: 似真的; 逼真的, 高度逼真的. The special effects were highly verisimilar and fooled many viewers. 特效高度逼真,欺骗了许多观众。

quiz.question: ____ cellar
quiz.explanation: 地窖; 酒窖, 酒窖. The restaurant has an extensive wine cellar with rare vintages. 这家餐厅有一个藏有稀有年份酒的大型酒窖。

quiz.question: stellar ___________
quiz.explanation: 恒星的; 杰出的, 出色的表现. The actor delivered a stellar performance in the leading role. 这位演员在主角中奉献了出色的表现。
